      • findFilm

      • checkStartTime

        private boolean checkStartTime(int lastTime,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> stSched,
                               int shour,
                               int smin,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> films,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lastTimeList,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> screenFilmListTemp)
        A method to check whether the entering time conflict to the previous schedule or not.
        参数:
        lastTime - the last time of the current choose film.
        stSched - the start time list of the current screen.
        shour - the start hour that user enter.
        smin - the start minute that user enter.
        films - the whole film list.
        lastTimeList - the last time list of
        screenFilmListTemp - the film list of current screen.
        返回:
        whether there is a conflict or not.
